app.title: JobForge Demo
app.subtitle: Workforce Intelligence / Intelligence de la main-d'oeuvre

load.title: Load Data
load.description: Select the target directory containing your WiQ data.
load.pathHint: Enter the path to your data directory or use default
load.prerequisite1: Power BI Desktop is open with a saved .pbix file (blank or target)
load.prerequisite2: The .pbix file has been SAVED (MCP requires a saved file to connect)
load.prerequisite3: Claude Code is open in VS Code Pro

powerbi.title: Power BI Building
powerbi.description: Watch as JobForge builds your semantic model in Power BI.
powerbi.instructions: Run /stagegold in Claude Code (VS Code Pro) to start the deployment. Arrange your browser and Power BI Desktop windows side-by-side.

catalogue.title: Create Catalogue
catalogue.description: Generate a DAMA DMBOK-compliant data catalogue.
catalogue.completeDesc: Your semantic model has been deployed to Power BI Desktop.
